problem.problem_class: Using left/right instead of start/end attributes
problem.description: Consider replacing android:paddingLeft with android:paddingStart="?android:attr/expandableListPreferredItemPaddingLeft" to better support right-to-left layouts

problem.problem_class: Using left/right instead of start/end attributes
problem.description: Consider replacing android:paddingLeft with android:paddingStart="?android:attr/expandableListPreferredChildPaddingLeft" to better support right-to-left layouts

problem.problem_class: Using left/right instead of start/end attributes
problem.description: Consider replacing android:layout_alignParentLeft with android:layout_alignParentStart="true" to better support right-to-left layouts

problem.problem_class: Using left/right instead of start/end attributes
problem.description: Consider replacing android:layout_alignParentRight with android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" to better support right-to-left layouts
